channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25193|2024-08-03T04:36:06.519Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20snow%20commander%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin 1.10 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25192|2024-08-03T04:36:06.188Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20snow%20commander%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin 1.10 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
